amendment.description: To strengthen civil-military relationships by permitting State and local governments to enter into lease purchase agreements with the United States Armed Forces.

action.text: Amendment SA 1428 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Durbin.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Proposed amendment SA 1428 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1428 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Durbin by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1428 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
